instructions: put the dinner plate on the charger
put the napkin on the dinner plate
place the dinner fork on the left hand side of the dinner plate
place the salad fork on the left hand side of the dinner fork
place the dinner knife on the right hand side of the dinner plate
place the tea spoon on the right hand side of the dinner knife
place the soup spoon on the right hand side of the tea spoon
place the water glass above the dinner plate
place the wine glass on right hand side of the water glass
place the wine glass above the soup spoon
place the coffee cup on the right hand side of the wine glass
put the bread plate on the left hand side of the  dinner plate
place the butter knife on top of the bread plate, pointing towards right hand side
place the dessert fork between the water glass and bread plate, pointing towards right hand side
place the dessert spoon between dinner plate and dessert fork, pointing left hand side
